price: 7. Mar kastoo aan u yeedhana si aad ugu denbi dhaafto, waxay yeelaan farahooda dhegahooda, iskuna dadaan maryahooda2, oo madax adaygaan, wayna is kibriyaan iskibrin.
arabic: وَإِنِّي كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوٓاْ أَصَٰبِعَهُمۡ فِيٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡاْ ثِيَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّواْ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارٗا
footnotes: 2. Iyagoo diidaya inay fiirshaan ama dhageystaan Xaqa.
